credit_line: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Wall pocket
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: satin weave with silk and metal thread embroidery
description: Long wall pocket with four sections and shaped top, made to hang. Bright red satin with embroidery in colored silks and metal threads. Each section has a symmetrical vine and flower design worked in polychrome silks, with gold threads, cords, and raised work. Trimmed with gold braid; backed with red taffeta.
name: Wall pocket
